Summary: Biochemical reaction from meloxicam to 5-methylthiazol-2-ylcarbamoylcarboxylic acid.
Biochemical reaction from 5'-carboxymeloxicam to 2-[(hydroxyacetyl)amino]-5- thiazolecarboxylic acid.
Biochemical reaction from meloxicam to 5'-hydroxymeloxicam. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2C9 or CYP3A4.
